title: Scarred

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scorn a player each night. They'll be roleblocked, and you'll receive any night messages they do, plus any they would have received were they not roleblocked.
- Wildly attack a player at night. You'll also attack all other players that visit them. You may only do this once. You may self-target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
